key_facts: Rebuilding 986K line monolith into modular v9.0
831 total modules to extract (62 DBs, 213 engines, 14 KBs, etc.)
Local work folder: C:\PRISM REBUILD (UPLOAD TO BOX OCCASSIONALLY)
critical_rules: IF IT EXISTS, USE IT EVERYWHERE - wire all DBs to consumers

VERIFY - check before AND after every change

session_workflow.work: Extract modules, verify consumers, update indexes
session_workflow.end: Run update_state.py, commit to git, push to GitHub
